code:
/** * @name isError * @summary Tests for a `Error` object instance. * @description * Checks to see if the input object is an instance of `Error`. * @example *
* * ```javascript * import { isError } from '@polkadot/util'; * * console.log('isError', isError(new Error('message'))); // => true * ``` */ export function isError(value) { return (value && value.constructor) === Error || value instanceof Error; }
